typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		{Flight#} as short,
		Origin as string,
		Dest as string,
		FlightDate as date,
		NoSalesReason as string,
		TransmittingFlightAttd as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> RIMSource
RIMSource derive({} = ERROR_FUNCTION(''),
		{} = ERROR_FUNCTION('')) ~> Transformation
